p: The polyphenol compositions of the oils are given in Table 4. Homovanillic acid, vanillin, p-coumaric acid, quercetin-3Î²-glucoside, quercetin, and apigenin were identified in MTSO. In nigella seed oil, 2,6-dihydroxybenzoic acid, homovanillic thymoquinone acid, vanillin and some amounts of chlorogenic acid, ferulic acid, quercetin, and apigenin were detected.
